description: go.tools/go/types: check for non-func init declarations

messages.text:

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.tools

https://codereview.appspot.com/11075043/diff/6001/go/types/testdata/decls0.src

go/types/testdata/decls0.src:59: func init() {}
On 2013/07/10 02:48:03, adonovan wrote:
> How about:
>    func init(int) {}
>    func init() string {}
> 
> Or are they already covered?

already covered in testdata/decls1.src at the bottom
